sig_info: When attacked Wasp gains an additional 20% chance to Purify, then Evade and Counter Attack. Additionally, the duration that Counter Attack is disabled after shrinking is reduced by 20.4 to 60%.

HEAVY ATTACKS: When Wasp charges a Heavy Attack while hitting with a Basic Attack Combo, the opponent loses sight of her and passively gets Stunned for 0.60 seconds.
Inflicts Weakness for 10 seconds if this attack was chained while hitting with a Basic Attack Combo, reducing the opponent’s Attack Rating by 30%.
EVASION - PASSIVE: When attacked Wasp has a 8% chance Purify all Degeneration, Poison, Shock, Incinerate and Coldsnap Debuffs then Passively shrink to Evade. Any time Wasp successfully Evades an attack she Counter Attacks, inflicting a Shock Debuff dealing 100 Energy Damage over 8 seconds.
PASSIVE: Whenever Wasp shrinks down, her next 2 hits will be critical, with +45 Attack Rating for each Debuff active on the opponent. Additionally, Counter Attack is disabled for 10 seconds.
When Wasp has Class Advantage, all of her abilities that are based on the Combo Meter receive an additional bonus equivalent to 40 more hits on her Combo Meter.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 40% chance to Stun for 2 second(s).
Concussion, reducing the opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 1% for each hit on her Combo Meter for 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Stings the opponent for 6 seconds. An opponent with sting takes 80 damage when activating a special attack.
After lasting its full duration Sting will convert into a Petrify Debuff of 1.75% Potency per hit on Wasp’s Combo Meter, lasting 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: +5 Attack Rating for each hit on her Combo Meter.

After lasting its full duration Sting will convert into a Petrify Debuff of 1.75% Potency per hit on Wasp’s Combo Meter, lasting 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: +150.7 Attack Rating for each hit on her Combo Meter.

sig_info: When attacked Wasp gains an additional 25% chance to Purify, then Evade and Counter Attack. Additionally, the duration that Counter Attack is disabled after shrinking is reduced by 25.58 to 64.99%.

HEAVY ATTACKS: When Wasp charges a Heavy Attack while hitting with a Basic Attack Combo, the opponent loses sight of her and passively gets Stunned for 0.60 seconds.
Inflicts Weakness for 10 seconds if this attack was chained while hitting with a Basic Attack Combo, reducing the opponent’s Attack Rating by 30%.
EVASION - PASSIVE: When attacked Wasp has a 8% chance Purify all Degeneration, Poison, Shock, Incinerate and Coldsnap Debuffs then Passively shrink to Evade. Any time Wasp successfully Evades an attack she Counter Attacks, inflicting a Shock Debuff dealing 3576 Energy Damage over 8 seconds.
PASSIVE: Whenever Wasp shrinks down, her next 2 hits will be critical, with +1609.2 Attack Rating for each Debuff active on the opponent. Additionally, Counter Attack is disabled for 10 seconds.
When Wasp has Class Advantage, all of her abilities that are based on the Combo Meter receive an additional bonus equivalent to 40 more hits on her Combo Meter.
